de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.opt

Interface CliOptions

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CliOptionsImplementation

    public interface CliOptions
    Describes the interface for all necessary command line options.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String AUTHOR
      Author name and email address.
      static boolean DEFAULT_DEBUG
      Default for debug switch.
      static String DEFAULT_ENCODING
      Default encoding for whole application.
      static boolean DEFAULT_HELP
      Default for help switch.
      static String DEFAULT_PATH_PREFIX
      Default path prefix.
      static boolean DEFAULT_VERSION
      Default for version switch.
      static String DESCRIPTION
      Usage header.
      static String EXECUTABLE
      Name of the CLI executable.
      static String FOOTER
      Usage footer.
      static String HEADER
      Description one liner.
      static String ISSUE_TRACKER
      URI to issue tracker.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputEncoding

        String getInputEncoding()
        Get the input encoding.
        Returns:
        by default it is DEFAULT_ENCODING

      • getOutputEncoding

        String getOutputEncoding()
        Get the output encoding.
        Returns:
        by default it is DEFAULT_ENCODING

      • getPathPrefix

        String getPathPrefix()
        Get the path prefix option.
        Returns:
        never null maybe empty

      • getReportFiles

        Collection<String> getReportFiles()
        Get report files.
        Returns:
        never null maybe empty

      • hasReportFiles

        boolean hasReportFiles()
        Whether there are report files or not.
        Returns:
        true if getReportFiles() is not empty, else false

      • isDebug

        boolean isDebug()
        Whether debug is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        Return true if debug is enabled, unless false.

      • isHelp

        boolean isHelp()
        Whether show help message is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        Return true if show help message is enabled, unless false

      • isVersion

        boolean isVersion()
        Whether show version information is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        Return true if show version is enabled, unless false.

      • setDebug

        void setDebug(boolean onOrOff)
        Set print debugging.
        Parameters:
        onOrOff - True enables, false disables (default).

      • setHelp

        void setHelp(boolean onOrOff)
        Set show help message.
        Parameters:
        onOrOff - True enables, false disables (default)

      • setInputEncoding

        void setInputEncoding(String inputEncoding)
        Set the input encoding.
        Parameters:
        inputEncoding - must not be null or empty

      • setOutputEncoding

        void setOutputEncoding(String outputEncoding)
        Set the output encoding.
        Parameters:
        outputEncoding - must not be null or empty

      • setPathPrefix

        void setPathPrefix(String pathPrefix)
        Set path prefix option.
        Parameters:
        pathPrefix - must not be null

      • setReportFiles

        void setReportFiles(Collection<String> files)
        Set report files.
        Parameters:
        files - must not be null

      • setVersion

        void setVersion(boolean onOrOff)
        Set version output option.
        Parameters:
        onOrOff - True will shows version, false not.

      • hasOnlyDefaultOptions

        boolean hasOnlyDefaultOptions()
        Signals if the options object only has default values.
        Returns:
        true if only default values are set, else true
